name: ORULeadershipPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open o. r. u. leadership podcast”
”Alexa, ask o. r. u. leadership podcast for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start o. r. u. leadership podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: o. r. u. leadership podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des: Develop your leadership by hearing from the Student Life Leadership Team at Oral Roberts University as they practically unpack what it means to be a Whole Person Leader. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". For questions about this skill, email the creator - Jesupelumi Wickliffe at jwickliffe@oru.edu.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
